summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new authentication and filter features. All backend APIs working perfectly (11/11 tests passed). Frontend authentication, filter system, recipe extraction, and tagging functionality all working correctly. Recipe privacy implemented properly - users only see their own recipes.

integration_issues.issue: 403 error when loading filters initially (but works after auth)
integration_issues.impact: Minor - filters load correctly after authentication

passed_tests: User registration with JWT token generation
User login with credential validation
Get current user info with authentication
Unauthorized access protection (returns 403)
Get default and custom filters
Create custom filter with color selection
Delete custom filter functionality
Authenticated recipe extraction (Brownies recipe with 7 ingredients, 5 steps)
Get user recipes with privacy (users only see their own recipes)
Update recipe tags functionality
Frontend auth page with login/register tabs
Frontend registration flow with redirect to main app
Directory page with filter buttons in 2 rows (Apéro, Entrées, Plats, Desserts / Salé, Sucré, Viande, Poisson)
Filter interaction and reset functionality
Recipe tiles displayed in smaller grid (grid-cols-5 equivalent)
Account page with profile management
Custom filter creation and deletion in account page
Recipe extraction from URL with AI processing
Recipe detail page with tag selection and saving
Recipe navigation and back button functionality
Recipe privacy - each user sees only their recipes
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (11/11 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (minor filter loading issue on initial load)
